backend/main.mo: Defines core types and state for audit events, access control, controllers, graph data, and broadcasting settings within the main backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing implemented frontend behavior changes, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, role checks, conditional dashboards, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when users lack access, offering login, role request guidance, principal copy, and ICP connection panels.
frontend/src/components/AuditLogDetailDi: Displays a detailed view of an audit log entry with formatted timestamps, severity indicators, and descriptive metadata.
Shows the user's authentication status, principal ID, and backend connectivity with copy and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/BroadcastConfigP: Allows enabling and configuring an external endpoint for broadcasting security events, including validation and saving settings.
Provides a file-based code editor with category switching, unsaved-change handling, and applying or resetting modifications.
frontend/src/components/DashboardViewSwi: Renders a toggle for switching between security and ICP operations dashboard views based on allowed permissions.
Explains deployment steps and links to the Caffeine platform for publishing the application.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with authentication controls, theme toggle, role-based titles, and optional dashboard view switching.
frontend/src/components/IcpConnectionPan: Displays ICP network connection status, canister info, and error alerts with retry capability.
frontend/src/components/IcpControllerMan: Provides UI for listing, granting, and revoking ICP Controller roles, including dialogs and input validation.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsCatal: Shows a searchable, categorized catalog of ICP controls with import/export, reset, and value editing features.
Renders a single ICP control row with the appropriate input widget based on control type.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsPanel: Wraps and introduces the ICP Controls catalog with a summary card and navigation anchor.
frontend/src/components/IcpMainnetDeploy: UI panel explaining ICP mainnet deployment prerequisites and step-by-step instructions.
frontend/src/components/NetworkMapCanvas: Canvas component that renders and interacts with a zoomable, draggable network graph with theme-aware styling.
frontend/src/components/NetworkMapInspec: Inspector panel for viewing and editing a selected node’s properties and managing its edges.
Main network map manager handling fetching, creating, updating, deleting nodes, and coordinating canvas and inspector views.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their profile name on first-time setup.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeAlertPan: Panel displaying recent critical or warning security alerts and flagged users in real time.
frontend/src/components/RolesAccessPanel: Displays user and app controller principals, handles initialization, and shows loading or error states for role access data.
frontend/src/components/RootTerminalPane: Implements an administrative terminal interface allowing command execution with history, permission checks, and audit logging.
frontend/src/components/SecuritySummaryP: Generates and displays security metrics from audit logs, including failed login spikes, critical events, and recent activity summaries.
frontend/src/components/SuperuserAuditPa: Provides superuser tools to export audit logs and flagged user data with audit recording and download utilities.
frontend/src/components/TestActionsPanel: UI for creating test audit log entries with configurable action types, severity, and metadata.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementPa: Provides UI to flag, unflag, and remove users by principal ID, showing a table of flagged users with actions. Uses hooks for backend mutations and input validation.
frontend/src/components/WebControlQuickT: Offers client‑side tools for copying principal IDs, importing/exporting ICP config, resetting settings, and refreshing the page. Uses ICP controls and Internet Identity hooks.
frontend/src/components/WorldWideWebCont: UI for granting and revoking World Wide Web Controller roles by principal ID, including validation and listing existing controllers. Integrates with backend role‑management hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Checks backend connectivity by calling a lightweight actor method and exposes connection status with retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardView.ts: Manages which dashboard view is selected based on user permissions and session state, with controlled switching logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpControls.ts: Manages ICP Controls config by merging URL, session, and default values, and provides setters and bulk update logic with validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login flow, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyNodes.ts: Tracks user-created node IDs per principal using sessionStorage and exposes helpers to add, remove, clear, and validate tracked nodes.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworkGraph.ts: Exposes React Query hooks to fetch and mutate network graph nodes and edges using an actor, with validation and toast-based error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, and controller statuses by calling backend actor methods tied to the current identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useTargetActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on current identity and ICP Controls, initializing access control when authenticated.
frontend/src/icp-controls/bindings.ts: Utility functions for ICP control definitions, including lookup, parsing, serialization, validation, and session storage key generation.
frontend/src/icp-controls/registry.ts: Defines all ICP control categories and control metadata, serving as the centralized registry for configurable application settings.
frontend/src/icp-controls/types.ts: Defines types for ICP control categories, control definitions, and UI options.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables, plus UI fixes for popovers, tabs, and canvas themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the security admin dashboard with audit logs, management panels, and a terminal.
frontend/src/pages/IcpOpsDashboard.tsx: Displays ICP operations tools, role‑based panels, network map, and a command terminal.
frontend/src/queryKeys.ts: Provides shared React Query key generators for caching ICP and security data.
frontend/src/terminal/commandRegistry.ts: Exports the terminal’s command registry composed from core commands.
frontend/src/terminal/coreCommands.ts: Implements core terminal commands including help, clear, and security‑related actions with audit logging.
frontend/src/terminal/icpControllerComma: Defines restricted terminal commands for ICP controller roles, including help, clear, and profile management.
frontend/src/terminal/terminalGuards.ts: Provides helpers for audit recording, error classification, backend/auth checks, and enum parsing for terminal commands.
frontend/src/terminal/types.ts: Defines interfaces for terminal commands, execution context, outputs, and history entries.
frontend/src/terminal/webControlAudit.ts: Wraps command execution with best‑effort audit logging and consistent error handling for Web Control commands.
frontend/src/terminal/webControlCommandC: Generates metadata for 200+ safe, read‑only diagnostic and operational terminal commands.
frontend/src/terminal/worldWideWebContro: Registers core terminal commands like help, clear, and controller status, integrating the generated catalog with audit handling.
frontend/src/types/networkGraph.ts: Declares types for network graph nodes, edges, and CRUD input structures.
frontend/src/utils/codeEditorStorage.ts: Manages code editor file state in localStorage, including loading, saving, applying, and detecting unsaved changes.
frontend/src/utils/icpControls.ts: Provides utilities for ICP network configuration, canister ID validation, and environment‑based defaults.
frontend/src/utils/icpControlsImportExpo: Provides functions to export, download, import, validate, and read ICP Controls configuration JSON files.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, planned architecture changes, known issues, and implemented features for the ICP-integrated security-enhanced app.
